hero.headline: Find the Best Deposition Summary Software for Your Firm
hero.subheadline: A single deposition transcript can take 6-8 hours to summarize by hand. AI deposition summary software does it in 3 minutes, complete with page-line citations. Here's how the tools compare.

sections.heading: What to Look for in Deposition Summary Software
paragraphs: Eight hours on a single transcript. That's the reality for paralegals drafting summaries manually. The best deposition summary software generates a polished summary with accurate page-line citations fast enough to keep pace with litigation deadlines. That's the baseline that separates useful tools from glorified text editors.

Look for software that supports multiple output formats: a page-line summary of deposition testimony, a narrative overview, or an issue-based digest. The best {{link:/blog/how-to-draft-a-page-line-deposition-summary/|AI deposition summary}} tools offer all three from a single upload.

Security matters. Deposition transcripts contain client information, work product, and privileged communications. Look for SOC 2 certification and AES-256 encryption at minimum, and confirm the vendor doesn't use your transcripts for model training.

Finally, evaluate cost on a per-page or per-transcript basis rather than sticker price alone. Traditional deposition summary services charge $3 to $10 per page, which adds up on high-volume caseloads. AI deposition summary tools like {{link:/deposition-summary-software/|Dodonai}} cut that cost while maintaining quality.

faq.answer: Speed and cost. Dodonai processes a typical transcript for under a dollar per page in minutes, compared to $3-$10 per page and 3-7 business days from outsourced services. You can also reprocess instantly if case priorities change.

faq.answer: Attorneys report that Dodonai's summaries are on par with manually drafted ones, with the added benefit of consistent formatting and instant availability. Every summary includes page-line citations so you can verify any statement against the original transcript.

faq.answer: Yes. Enter key topics, issues, or witness names and the AI gives them additional emphasis while still capturing the full scope of testimony. You can also choose between {{link:/blog/how-to-draft-a-page-line-deposition-summary/|page-line}} and narrative formats.
